name: Little Death (Firelord Bob)
description:
Little Death is a Sidescroller Beat 'em Up where a new grim reaper must take the scythe to guide souls into the afterlife. He starts small under the instruction of the Death of Rats, and must learn to defeat stronger enemies!

A & D to move

W to Jump

Shift to Sprint

Left Click and Hold to Charge Scythe

Release Left Click to swing

If you have issues with input, try refreshing the browser window or use the windows download version. If it doesn't fit try zooming out in the browser.
